activities.message:
Hi 4lemon,

Thanks for your report. We are investigating now.

Hello,

We believe to have resolved this data leakage.  Can you help us confirm?
We're looking at this again now.  Thanks for your patience @4lemon
We believe to have resolved this issue.  Can you confirm?

Thank you for helping us resolve this issue.  In this case, our security was adjusted for better defense in depth, but no direct exploitation is possible.  As a result, we are rewarding $100 for identifying it.
Thanks again!
Why would you want to publicly disclose a bug we've already fixed?
